title: PendingDeprecationWarnings with Python 2.7
body:
When PYTHONWARNINGS="d" environmental variable or  -Wd option is used, then test suite with Python 2.7 triggers some PendingDeprecationWarnings.
assertTrue and assertFalse should not be overriden, if they already exist.

```
$ python2.7 -Wd test.py --verbose
test_1_encode (test_message.MessageTest) ... ok
test_2_decode (test_message.MessageTest) ... ok
test_3_add (test_message.MessageTest) ... ok
test_4_misc (test_message.MessageTest) ... ok
test_1_simple (test_file.BufferedFileTest) ... ok
test_2_readline (test_file.BufferedFileTest) ... ok
test_3_lf (test_file.BufferedFileTest) ... ok
test_4_write (test_file.BufferedFileTest) ... ok
test_5_flush (test_file.BufferedFileTest) ... ok
test_6_buffering (test_file.BufferedFileTest) ... ok
test_7_read_all (test_file.BufferedFileTest) ... ok
test_1_buffered_pipe (test_buffered_pipe.BufferedPipeTest) ... ok
test_2_delay (test_buffered_pipe.BufferedPipeTest) ... ok
test_3_close_while_reading (test_buffered_pipe.BufferedPipeTest) ... ok
test_4_or_pipe (test_buffered_pipe.BufferedPipeTest) ... tests/test_buffered_pipe.py:86: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertFalse instead.
  self.assertFalse(p._set)
tests/test_buffered_pipe.py:88: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue(p._set)
tests/test_buffered_pipe.py:90: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue(p._set)
tests/test_buffered_pipe.py:92: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue(p._set)
tests/test_buffered_pipe.py:94: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertFalse instead.
  self.assertFalse(p._set)
ok
test_1_import (test_util.UtilTest) ... tests/test_util.py:77: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('Transport' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:78: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SSHClient' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:79: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('MissingHostKeyPolicy' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:80: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('AutoAddPolicy' in symbols)

tests/test_util.py:88: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('Message' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:89: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SSHException' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:90: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('AuthenticationException' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:91: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.

tests/test_util.py:92: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('BadAuthenticationType' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:93: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('ChannelException' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:94: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SFTP' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:95: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SFTPFile' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:96: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SFTPHandle' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:97: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SFTPClient' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:98: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SFTPServer' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:99: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SFTPError' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:100: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SFTPAttributes' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:101: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SFTPServerInterface' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:102: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('ServerInterface' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:103: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('BufferedFile' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:104: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('Agent' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:105: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('AgentKey' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:106: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('HostKeys' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:107: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('SSHConfig' in symbols)
tests/test_util.py:108: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue('util' in symbols)
ok
test_2_parse_config (test_util.UtilTest) ... ok
test_3_host_config (test_util.UtilTest) ... ok
test_4_generate_key_bytes (test_util.UtilTest) ... ok

test_7_host_config_expose_issue_33 (test_util.UtilTest) ... ok
test_8_eintr_retry (test_util.UtilTest) ... tests/test_util.py:193: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
  self.assertTrue(paramiko.util.retry_on_signal(raises_intr) is None)
ok

test_E_reverse_port_forwarding (test_transport.TransportTest) ... tests/test_transport.py:508: PendingDeprecationWarning: Please use assertTrue instead.
```
